Description_lang: Mekkatorque sticks a target with a volatile energy charge that inflicts $s2 Nature damage every $t2 sec for $d.When $@spellname283409 expires, it triggers a $@spellname283411 that strikes all targets within line of sight of the victim.
AuraDescription_lang: $s2 Nature damage every $T2 sec.Triggers a $@spellname283411 that strikes all targets within line of sight upon expiraton.
